attributes.action: Review west dunbartonshire councils decision to increase council's nursery fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: West Dunbartonshire Council have decided to increase nursery fees by 232percent the average family pays £210 per month for full time nursey and with the increase charges are rising to £600 per month this is neither fair nor acceptable, please sign this petition to be presented to the council 2 make sure they understand parent power and we will not stand for it

rejection.details: This is a local government matter. Please contact your local MP.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
